# File lib/flex_times.rb, line 195
    def to_date
      hsh = symbolize_keys
      [:year, :month, :day].each {|key| 
          raise ArgumentError, "Cannot convert to Date, missing #{key}" if !hsh.has_key?(key)
          hsh[key] = hsh[key].to_i
          }
      Date.new(hsh[:year], hsh[:month], hsh[:day])
    end
